or ( COMPONENT = 'S4CORE' and VERSION = '103' and (lpad(SP,4,'0')) < '0008' )
or ( COMPONENT = 'S4CORE' and VERSION = '104' and (lpad(SP,4,'0')) < '0006' )
or ( COMPONENT = 'S4CORE' and VERSION = '105' and (lpad(SP,4,'0')) < '0004' )
or ( COMPONENT = 'S4CORE' and VERSION = '106' and (lpad(SP,4,'0')) < '0001' )
)

checkitem.desc: [p3-CVSS 4.3] [CVE-2026-23683] FI-LOC-FI-RU - Note 0003122486 missing and applicable using Correction Instruction
checkitem.noncompliant:
( ( COMPONENT = 'S4CORE' and VERSION = '102' and lpad(SP,4,'0') between '0000' and '0009' )
or ( COMPONENT = 'S4CORE' and VERSION = '103' and lpad(SP,4,'0') between '0000' and '0007' )
or ( COMPONENT = 'S4CORE' and VERSION = '104' and lpad(SP,4,'0') between '0000' and '0005' )
or ( COMPONENT = 'S4CORE' and VERSION = '105' and lpad(SP,4,'0') between '0000' and '0003' )
or ( COMPONENT = 'S4CORE' and VERSION = '106' and lpad(SP,4,'0') = '0000' )
)
